metadata.description: Family dinner conversations at home for second-class

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 你好! 我是小美。让我们学习如何在家庭晚餐时交谈。

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: Say: 'Today we learned about Irish history'

transcript.speaker: child
transcript.content: Today we learned about Irish history

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 太棒了! Sharing your day brings family together!

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: You can also say: 'Can you pass the rice, please?'

transcript.speaker: child
transcript.content: Can you pass the rice, please?

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 好棒! Family dinners are special in every language!
